attributes.action: pull the UK out of the European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is no real economic benefit to the uk being in the European Union.

Cost of membership is substantial.

It knocks-down our immigration border control.

It dictates laws and rules to us.

It is rife with corruption.

Let's pull out, and re-invest the membership cash into our own countries infrastructure - which is in dire need of investment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
